[bq="Too_Offensive"]Thank you YouTube wii u app for bugging the fuck out and leaving the image of a faceless man pointing straight at me for several seconds for no apparent reason[/bq]
The YouTube mobile app is pretty crap too, it straight-up doesn't load anything if you have 2 bars of wifi instead of 3, and if you try switching to 3G instead of a wifi connection, then it will just refuse to play the video again sometimes.

The screen rotation is also screwed up, sometimes it will try to put the vertical orientation horizontally.
